headline: NBC's Michele Tafoya leaving sports to help GOP governor candidate in Minnesota
author: Monique Beals
sentences: Tafoya, who worked her final NFL game Sunday at the Super Bowl, said it was her “decision” top step away from reporting and move into politics as Qualls, a businessman and Army veteran, runs for the Republican gubernatorial nomination in Minnesota.
Michele Tafoya, a longtime NFL sideline reporter for NBC, on Monday announced that she will serve as co-chair of Kendall Qualls's gubernatorial bid in Minnesota.
Tafoya will also participate in the Conservative Political Action Conference, according to a report from The Athletic.
The conference is scheduled for late February.
